"Message to the Lillipans": "Communicate [Lobby Action] in Lillipan words!"
"Communicate [Lobby Action] in Lillipan words!"
"Communicate your message using Lobby Actions!"
"What's this? The Lillipan wants to send a message. I wonder what it's trying to say...?"

"/face2 伝言、伝わったようです！
ふぅ、なんだかこれでリリーパ族とも
仲良くなれた気がしますね！"

"/face4 ああっ、帰っちゃった？

"He must be trying to tell his friend something. Try mimicking the same gestures and see if that works."
"Hm? It seem the Lillipan is trying to tell you something. Pay attention to his gestures!"

"It looks like you've found the

"Lillipan spotted! This time, there are no enemies. Do your best to relay the message!"

"He's frightened and won't look this way. Finish dealing with all of the enemies first!"
